events.message: Customer reported a collision involving their car on Main Street around 7 AM. The vehicle sustained significant front-end damage.
The claim was categorised under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial report and confirming keywords related to a car collision.
An agent specializing in vehicle accident claims was assigned to handle this case and begin the processing steps.
The claimant received confirmation that their auto accident claim was officially acknowledged by the insurance provider.
Requested police report and photographic evidence of the damaged vehicle to further assess the claim details.
Customer submitted all requested documents including police report, photos, and repair estimates for the vehicle.
Investigation into the cause and circumstances of the auto accident has begun to verify claim validity and coverage.
Investigation concluded confirming the customer was not at fault and that the claim details are accurate.
A settlement offer was proposed to the claimant based on damage assessments and policy coverage terms.
Customer responded positively to the settlement proposal and expressed satisfaction with the handling so far.
The claim was officially approved by the claims department after review of all documents and investigation results.
Payment for the agreed settlement amount has been issued to the claimantâ€™s bank account for repair expenses.
The auto accident claim has been closed successfully after settlement payment and confirmation of repair progress.
The case documents and files related to the auto accident claim have been archived for future reference and compliance.
